description.english: Lure 10 enemies to fall to their death

description.english: Use enemies to kill 15 enemies for you

description.english: Complete the game with less than 5 deaths
description.arabic: أكمل اللعبة دون أن تُقتل أكثر من 5 مرات
description.brazilian: Completar o jogo com menos de 5 vidas
description.danish: Gennemfør spillet uden at dø mere end fire gange
description.dutch: Voltooi de game en sneuvel minder dan 5 keer
description.french: Terminez le jeu en trépassant moins de 5 fois
description.german: Beende das Spiel mit weniger als 5 Toden
description.italian: Finisci il gioco morendo meno di 5 volte
description.japanese: 5回以下死んでゲームをクリアする
description.norwegian: Fullfør spillet med færre enn 5 dødsfall
description.polish: Ukończ grę, ginąc mniej niż 5 razy
description.portuguese: Completa o jogo morrendo menos de 5 vezes
description.russian: Пройдите игру, погибнув не более пяти раз.
description.schinese: 在死亡不超过5次的情况下游戏通关。
description.spanish: Termina el juego muriendo menos de 5 veces.
description.turkish: Oyunu 5 defadan daha az ölerek tamamla
description.tchinese: 在死亡不超過5次的情況下完成遊戲。
description.swedish: Dö högst 5 gånger och klara spelet

description.arabic: أسرع في إتمام اللعبة خلال 5 ساعات
description.brazilian: Completar o jogo rapidamente em 5 horas
description.danish: Gennemfør spillet på mindre end 5 timer.
description.dutch: Speel in 5 uur het spel zo snel je kunt
description.french: Terminez le jeu en moins de 5 heures
description.german: Rase innerhalb von 5 Stunden durch das Spiel
description.japanese: ゲームを5時間以内でスピードランする
description.polish: Ukończ grę jak najszybciej, w czasie poniżej 5 godzin
description.portuguese: Completa o jogo em menos de 5 horas
description.russian: Пройдите игру на скорость за 5 часов
description.spanish: Completa el juego a toda velocidad en menos de 5 horas.
description.turkish: Oyunu 5 saat içinde en hızlı şekilde bitir
description.swedish: Klara spelet på mindre än 5 timmar

description.english: Complete the game with no sword, health, energy, or workshop upgrades
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ohne Schwert-, Gesundheits-, Energie- oder Laden-Upgrades ab
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans améliorations de l'épée, ni le santé, ni l'énergie, ni celles de la boutique
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza potenziare spada, salute, energia o negozio
description.koreana: 칼, 체력, 에너지 업그레이드 및 상품 구매 없이 게임을 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin arma, salud, energía ni mejoras de la tienda.
description.schinese: 不升级剑、生命值、能量或商店的情况下完成游戏
description.tchinese: 不升級劍、生命值、能量或商店的情況下完成遊戲
description.russian: Пройдите игру, не используя улучшений меча, здоровья, энергии или магазина.
description.japanese: 剣、HP、エネルギー、ショップのアップグレードなしでゲームをクリアする
description.portuguese: Completa o jogo sem melhorias de espada, vida, energia ou da loja
description.polish: Ukończ grę, nie używając ulepszeń miecza, zdrowia i energii, ani ulepszeń ze sklepu
description.danish: Gennemfør spillet uden opgraderinger til sværd, helbred, energi eller butik
description.dutch: Voltooi de game zonder zwaard-, gezondheid-, energie- of winkelupgrades
description.finnish: Läpäise peli kehittämättä miekkaa, kuntoa energiaa tai hankkimatta kaupasta kehitysosia.
description.norwegian: Fullfør spillet uten sverd eller helse-, energi- eller butikkoppgraderinger
description.swedish: Klara spelet utan uppgraderingar till svärdet, hälsan, energin eller butiken
description.turkish: Oyunu, kılıç, sağlık, enerji veya dükkan geliştirmesi olmadan tamamla
description.arabic: استكمل اللعبة دون تحسين السيف، أو الصحة، أو الطاقة، أو المتجر
description.brazilian: Completar o jogo sem aprimorar espada, vida, energia ou loja
